author: kfogel
msg: * tools/hook-scripts/commit-email.pl.in: Fix some wordings in usage.

author: kfogel
msg: Follow up to r17874, simplifying the svntest base64 encoder situation:
(BASE64_E): Eliminate; just set BASE64 usefully from the start.

author: pburba
msg: Merge r17793:17799 from svn/branches/1.3.x to svn/branches/ebcdic/1.3.x
Catch ebcdic port up to 1.3.x RC6.

author: pburba
msg: Final tweaks to python tests for 1.3.x RC5 - All tests now pass.
Use *LIBL for svnserve if --lib=LIB is not specified.
(display_lines): Use display_lines_as400 to prevent Errno 3003 (Data was
truncated on an input, output or update operation) when writing long
strings to the log spool file.
